summary: This API is designed to allow sellers to update their operating hours
description: This API is designed to allow sellers to update their operating hours. It is essential that the values provided in this API align with the restrictions retrieved from the v2.logistics.get_operating_hour_restrictions API to ensure compliance with platform requirements. This API uses overwriting updates, when updating pickup operating hours, still need to include all parts even those not needing changes.

query.name: name
query.description: Name of the special operating hour which can be retrieved from v2.logistics.get_operating_hours

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/logistics/delete_special_operating_hour?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST',
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => '{
    "name": "3.3 Campaign"
}',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

error_codes.message: Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: This shop isn't eligible to set up Regular Operating Hours.
Special Operating Hours not found for this shop.
Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: This shop isn't eligible to set up Special Operating Hours.
